scripts.install: npm install --prefix frameworks/html && npm install --prefix frameworks/react && npm install --prefix frameworks/angular
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frameworks/html && npm run build --prefix frameworks/react && npm run build --prefix frameworks/angular
scripts.quickstart: npm run install && npm run build
scripts.update:cloudinary/base: npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix frameworks/html && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix frameworks/react && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix frameworks/angular && npm install @cloudinary/base@latest --prefix ./angular/projects/cloudinary-library
